name: EDP 445 SIMULATOR
description:
After months of talking to your favorite YouTuber, 13-year-old Sally Jailbait finally planned a day to meet her idol... EDP 445! But as the meeting date comes closer, EDP clarifies that he has much more than cupcakes on the mind. Sensing what is happening and scared of him trying anything your not ready to do you cancel the meeting last minute... but once a preditor smells blood in the water, stopping them isn't so easy.

This game was made for a small game jam with my professor, please let me know of any and all glitches... please and TY...
